message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.HC, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses a system for contextual learning using reinforcement-based algorithms, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The system is applied to content recommendation, which involves information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper also addresses issues related to user interface and debuggability, which are relevant to human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and systems and control (cs.SI).
